meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by increased metabolic activity.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the patient's hypermetabolic condition meant their body was very active.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's hypermetabolic state allowed them to burn calories quickly.
meanings.sent3: The hypermetabolic squirrel was always on the move, gathering nuts at lightning speed.
meanings.sent4: Her hypermetabolic mind raced with ideas, never slowing down.
meanings.sent5: The hypermetabolic volcano spewed lava with incredible speed and intensity.

meanings.definition: Having an abnormally high metabolic rate.
meanings.sent1: The hypermetabolic cat was always running around the house, full of energy.
meanings.sent2: The patient's hypermetabolic condition required constant monitoring by the medical team.
meanings.sent3: The hypermetabolic puppy ate all the food in seconds, leaving nothing for the other dogs.
meanings.sent4: His hypermetabolic metabolism burned through calories like a furnace.
meanings.sent5: The hypermetabolic engine of the car never seemed to run out of fuel.
